mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS(COMM_NO, MEM_NO, BOARD_NO, COMM_CONTENT, COMM_STATUS, COMM_DATE) VALUES(COMMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mem_No}, #{board_No}, #{comm_Content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET COMM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE COMM_NO = #{comm_No}
